mods.railcraft.api.carts

Interface IEnergyTransfer


  • public interface IEnergyTransfer
    This interface is implemented by the Energy Cart and is used by the Energy Loaders to charge/discharge carts. It is roughly equivalent to the IItemTransfer interface and based on ElectricItem and IElectricItem.
    Author:
    CovertJaguar
    See Also:
    IItemTransfer

    • Method Detail

      • injectEnergy

        int injectEnergy(java.lang.Object source,
               int amount,
               int tier,
               boolean ignoreTransferLimit,
               boolean simulate,
               boolean passAlong)
        Injects the specified amount of EU into the device. The function returns the remainder of the EU after any EU used is subtracted.
        Parameters:
        source - Object initiating the transfer, should be an Entity or Tile Entity
        amount - amount of energy to transfer in EU
        tier - tier of the source device, has to be at least as high as the target device
        ignoreTransferLimit - ignore the transfer limit specified by getTransferLimit()
        simulate - don't actually change the item, just determine the return value
        Returns:
        The amount of EU not used

      • extractEnergy

        int extractEnergy(java.lang.Object source,
                int amount,
                int tier,
                boolean ignoreTransferLimit,
                boolean simulate,
                boolean passAlong)
        Requests a certain amount of EU from the device. The is function will subtract EU from the device's store of power and return a portion up to, but not exceeding, the amount of EU requested.
        Parameters:
        source - Object initiating the transfer, should be an Entity or Tile Entity
        amount - amount of energy to transfer in EU
        tier - tier of the source device, has to be at least as high as the target device
        ignoreTransferLimit - ignore the transfer limit specified by getTransferLimit()
        simulate - don't actually change the item, just determine the return value
        passAlong - whether neighboring carts should be asked to provide any missing power.
        Returns:
        The amount of EU transferred

      • canInjectEnergy

        boolean canInjectEnergy()
        Return true if energy can be injected into this device.
        Returns:
        true if can inject energy

      • canExtractEnergy

        boolean canExtractEnergy()

        the transfer rate
